header.title: Golden Globe Award for Best Motion Picture - Musical or Comedy

categories.category: Best Musical or Comedy Picture Golden Globe winners

col.b: It has been suggested that this list should be changed into a format to meet Wikipedia's Wikipedia style guidelines|quality standards.
col.p: This list may be better presented as a table. Please help improve this list, prune it, or discuss it on the . This article has been tagged since January 2008.

bdy.p:
Golden Globe Award for Best Motion Picture - Musical or Comedy has been awarded annually since
1952
by the
Hollywood Foreign Press Association
.

list.entry:
1953 -
With a Song in My Heart

entry.it: I'll See You in My Dreams ''
The Teahouse of the August Moon ''

list.entry:
1960 -
Some Like It Hot ; Porgy and Bess

1962 -
A Majority of One
;
West Side Story

entry.it: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World ''
Those Magnificent Men in Their Flying Machines ''

list.entry: 1967 - The Russians Are Coming, The Russians Are Coming

entry.it: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum ''
Not with My Wife, You Don't! ''
The Return of the Pink Panther ''
The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas ''
Down and Out in Beverly Hills''
The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert ''
Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind ''
